Articles.Content: I've been having a problem with getting the dimensions right in KSP. I'm using 3dsmax, I set the units to meters, yet my part is still too large. The part I'm making is 1m in diameter. I've already checked the scale in the cfg file and exporter , and they are both set to 1.

In 3ds max DAE exporter, set the scale to 'Meters'. It scales it down to some arbitrary number of something like 0.02445345y9835435345b so it's easier just to set it to that instead of remembering that number (and two letters)

Otherwise you get what you have there.
I'm actually using .obj, .dae doesn't seem to like me.
Did you also set the System Units Setup found in the Units Setup?
Oh wow, im an idiot... Thanks man!
